meanings.definition: A person or company that supplies provisions or supplies.
meanings.sent1: The provisioners delivered food to the campsite.
meanings.sent2: The provisioners stocked the shelves with fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The provisioners accidentally delivered a truckload of bananas to the zoo!
meanings.sent4: The provisioners were like magical elves, bringing everything needed for the journey.
meanings.sent5: The provisioners were always reliable, ensuring no one went hungry.

meanings.definition: The act of providing or supplying something.
meanings.sent1: The provisioners made sure everyone had enough blankets for the winter.
meanings.sent2: The provisioners worked tirelessly to meet the demands of the community.
meanings.sent3: The provisioners organized a surprise party for the office staff.
meanings.sent4: The provisioners of knowledge shared their wisdom with the eager students.
meanings.sent5: The provisioners of hope brought light to the darkest times.
